Sentencas: As environmental pollution worsens, many strategies are emerging to reduce CO2 in various chemical processes.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: The practical strategy of byproduct hydrogen utilization in propane dehydrogenation is also being reviewed a lot.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: In this work, a comprehensive analysis was conducted for propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: Especially, membrane reactor and sequential reactor were used to increase the yield of the process.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: All assessments were investigated based on Aspen Plus (R), which is com-mercial software for process simulation.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: Levelized cost of electricity was derived through itemized cost esti-mation.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: The 2.81 $ kWh-1 of levelized cost of electricity was revealed through itemized cost estimation; it is higher than industrial electricity in general.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: Therefore, various scenarios were conducted to reduce the levelized cost of electricity compared to industrial electricity price on sale, currently.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: The optimistic case (1.20 $ kWh-1) can be priced close to industrial electricity price through 100 % of propane recycling rate and -20 % of reduction in the price of the influential factors.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: For life cycle assessment, the environmental impact of global warming potential was assessed as 4.93 kg CO2 eq MJ-1 of CO2 emissions.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: Various scenarios had been proposed to reduce CO2 as with the economic assessment.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: Under pessimistic, realistic, and optimistic conditions, the results of global warming potential were 5.61, 4.93, and 4.25 kg CO2 eq MJ-1, respectively.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects

Sentencas: The comprehensive analysis will be presented as guidelines for the actual use of byproduct hydrogen.
Titulo: Novel propane dehydrogenation process design integrated with membrane reactor and solid oxide fuel cell: Economic and environmental aspects
